Maternal condition
/circle6 Record the maternal pulse on the graph every half an hour and mark with a dot ( .).
/circle6 Record the womanâ€™s blood pressure on the graph every four hours, using a vertical 
arrow ( ) with the upper end of the arrow signifying the systolic blood pressure and 
the lower end indicating the diastolic blood pressure.
/circle6 Record the temperature every four hours and note it on the temperature graph.
